description: Third group project of TechNative Academy, a full stack project where users can add a bags and its contents. The project was completed with a quad programming approach. Note: The database for this app is hosted on Render so the website may take up to 50 seconds to retrieve information.
Second group project of TechNative Academy, which utilises React-Redux to create API calls to ChatGPT. My role included handling the API calls using redux thunk and styling the ask and home page.
First group project completed for TechNative Academy. Website using vanilla HTML, CSS and JS. My role was to create the index page.

A group full stack project created as part of the Code First Girls Degree. Delivered to a deadline. I was responsible for testing and implementing Yelp API integration and using Flask/Jinja to render information dynamically from the requests. Scored 84%.
A CLI app that allows you to interact with and modify a MySQL cookbook database using an API. Made for the CFG Degree, this project got 100%.
A cute web app inspired by flash dress up games. Dress up a poro from League Of Legends. Made for the Code First Girls Degree, this project got 100%.
My first attempt at using React during TechNative Academy, themed around mallards. It uses props, hooks (useEffect, useState), redux and https://random-d.uk/api.

The first website I created from scratch! Created as a final project for Code First Girls: Intro to Web Dev. Currently, only the front end has been created with plans to create a working meal planning web app. Watch this space!
A discord bot that retrieves data from RatAPI to send users cute rat images and facts.
An API that allows users to retrieve images of rats or facts about rats.
